description: Revised entire song and corrected chord progressions and other instrumentation, as seen live. Added names for tracks, simplified some instrument tracks, made it easier to read, added labels for verse/chorus etc. This should be almost 100% correct. Minus some vocal melodies and some instrument and vocal layers, but the main instruments and chords are correct.
title: Swing Life Away

description: Aaron's revision removed a large chunk of the song, because that version is the Punk Goes Acoustic version. That version is shorter and does not have the bridge/solo. I am restoring to the Siren Song of the Counter Culture version, which is the longer version with the bridge/solo and the one that people are more familiar with.
title: Swing Life Away
